ca.corefacility.gview.map.controllers

Class LabelStyleController

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.corefacility.gview.map.controllers.Controller
      • ca.corefacility.gview.map.controllers.LabelStyleController

  • public class LabelStyleController
extends Controller
    This class is responsible for controlling access to the label styles.
    Author:
    Eric Marinier

      • initializeLabelLocks

        public void initializeLabelLocks(java.util.Iterator<SlotStyle> slotStyles)
        Determines whether or not to set ALL the label locks. This will be determined on an individual basis, and will set the lock only in the case where the set color matches the label text color.
        Parameters:
        slotStyles -
